Name: The Glade
About the game: Enter The Glade: A beautiful forest with only one issue - it's overrun by giant spiders! You must fight to survive increasing waves of attacking spiders in this exhilarating first-person survival shooter. Armed with a pistol, you’ll earn points for defeating enemies that you can use for weapon upgrades like laser guns and grenades. You might even get over your fear of spiders. Features: • Use multiple weapons with intuitive hand controls • Earn points to upgrade your guns, buy ammo and grenades • Endless gameplay
Meta Title: The Glade: May 29, 2017, Kelly Studios and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on The Glade? Check out the release date (May 29, 2017), developer insights from Kelly Studios, and a complete game summary.
